**UI Location**: Mentoring session â†’ File panel â†’ Tab bar
**When Users See This**: When test files are available for the current iteration
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Tests"
studentInfo.whoYoureMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Subtitle indicating the role of the user with respect to the student
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session â†’ Student Info section (subtitle)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the student's information in a mentoring session
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Who you're mentoring"
scratchpad.introducingYourScratchpad:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the scratchpad introducer.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session â†’ Scratchpad (Introducer heading)
**When Users See This**: When the scratchpad introducer is visible.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Introducing your scratchpad"
scratchpad.revertToSaved:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to revert changes in the scratchpad to the last saved version.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session â†’ Scratchpad (Editor footer)
**When Users See This**: When there are unsaved changes in the scratchpad.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Revert to saved"
scratchpad.save:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to save the current content of the scratchpad.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session â†’ Scratchpad (Editor footer)
**When Users See This**: When the scratchpad is being edited.
**Technical Context**: Standard button text.
**Current English**: "Save"
scratchpad.unsaved:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating that there are unsaved changes.
**UI Location**: Mentoring Session â†’ Scratchpad (Top right corner, next to title)
**When Users See This**: When the scratchpad content has been modified but not saved.
**Technical Context**: Appears as an AlertTag component when screen width is not below 'lg'.
**Current English**: "Unsaved"
components.mentoring.session.mentorNotes:
**Functional Purpose**: Text for a link to create a Pull Request on GitHub.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Mentor notes section
**When Users See This**: When there are no mentoring notes or when users want to improve existing notes.
**Technical Context**: This text is part of an anchor tag. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Pull Request on GitHub"

**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section about improving mentoring notes.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Mentor notes section
**When Users See This**: Always shown when mentoring notes are present.
**Technical Context**: Standard heading text. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Improve these notes"
components.mentoring.session.iterationBu:
**Functional Purpose**: Label indicating a new iteration.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Iteration button
**When Users See This**: When an iteration is newly created and has no comments.
**Technical Context**: This text is displayed within a `div` element. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "New"

**Functional Purpose**: ARIA label for an iteration button, describing its purpose.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Iteration selector
**When Users See This**: When hovering over or focusing on an iteration button.
**Technical Context**: Used in an `aria-label` attribute. The variable `idx` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Go to iteration %{idx}"

**Functional Purpose**: Plural form for the word 'comment' used in an ARIA label.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Iteration button ARIA label
**When Users See This**: When an iteration has more than one comment, as part of the accessibility label.
**Technical Context**: This key is used for pluralization logic. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "comments"

**Functional Purpose**: Singular form for the word 'comment' used in an ARIA label.
**UI Location**: Mentoring session page â†’ Iteration button ARIA label
**When Users See This**: When an iteration has exactly one comment, as part of the accessibility label.
**Technical Context**: This key is used for pluralization logic. Must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "comment"
